definitions.definition: Obtained by derivation ; not radical, original, or fundamental.
Imitative of the work of someone else.
Referring to a work, such as a translation or adaptation, based on another work that may be subject to copyright restrictions.
Having a value that depends on an underlying asset of variable value.

main_definition: Obtained by derivation ; not radical, original, or fundamental.
secondary_definitions: Imitative of the work of someone else.
( law , copyright law ) Referring to a work, such as a translation or adaptation, based on another work that may be subject to copyright restrictions.
( finance ) Having a value that depends on an underlying asset of variable value.
